ygData.subject: Driver Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I recently installed EQ on a second box in my house, the video card it has in it is the old 3dfx voodoo banshee, do any of you know where I could find the most
ygData.messageBody:
I recently installed EQ on a second box in my house, the video card it has in it is the old 3dfx voodoo banshee, do any of you know where I could find the most compatible driver to run EQ, Ive been frustraded the past couple of days in trying to get that computer up and running, yesterday I finnaly found on that makes EQ work, but If I zone into any zone with people in the game freezes up and sometimes drops me back to the desktop, It has 128 megs of ram in the PII PC, I will have 256 in a couple of days I have all of the luclan models turned off.  I will probably just get a new Vid card but for now want to know If I can make this one work.
 
Nakoor 61 Mage
Officer of Sacred Honor
Solesk Ro
 
"Have Peals, Will CoTH"
